schema.value:
/****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS  ******/
SELECT [Matching value LMDB]
      ,[Matching value LMDB II]
      ,[Site Ship To (char)]
      ,[Date]
      ,[Transaction Time]
      ,[Transaction ID]
      ,[Card Number]
      ,[Transaction Value]
      ,[Transaction Quantity]
	  ,CONCAT([Date],' ',[Transaction Time]) AS COMPARE
	  ,DATEADD(ss,240,CONVERT(datetime,CONCAT([Date],' ',[Transaction Time]))) as DATEAHEAD
	  ,DATEADD(ss,-240,CONVERT(datetime,CONCAT([Date],' ',[Transaction Time]))) as DATELAG
  FROM [SHELL_POC].[LOYALTY_NL_CR]
